info.official_title: Evaluation of CAR (Chimeric Antigen Receptor) Modified Autologous T Cell CCT301-59 in Patients With Recurrent or Refractory Solid Tumors on the Basis of Safety, Tolerability and Anti-tumor Activity Study.

identified_line.line: 1. Voluntary to participate in the clinical study, subjects and their family members agree to sign the informed consent form and follow all trial procedures.

criterions.exact_snippets: Voluntary to participate in the clinical study
subjects and their family members agree to sign the informed consent form

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Voluntary to participate in the clinical study
subjects and their family members agree to sign the informed consent form

identified_line.line: 2. Male or female subjects 18-70 years of age.

5. Subjects with ROR2 positive tumor tissue: the percentage of ROR2 positive staining cells in tumor cells detected by immunohistochemistry or RNA (Ribonucleic acid) in situ hybridization is ≥ 50%. The samples could be used within one year , otherwise the sample will be re-collected for biopsy.

criterions.exact_snippets: percentage of ROR2 positive staining cells in tumor cells ... is ≥ 50%
criterions.criterion: percentage of ROR2 positive staining cells

criterions.exact_snippets: samples could be used within one year

and_criteria.exact_snippets: percentage of ROR2 positive staining cells in tumor cells ... is ≥ 50%
and_criteria.criterion: percentage of ROR2 positive staining cells

or_criteria.exact_snippets: samples could be used within one year
samples could be used within one year

identified_line.line: 6. Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status (ECOG PS) score is 0 to 1.

criterions.exact_snippets: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status (ECOG PS) score is 0 to 1.

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status (ECOG PS) score is 0 to 1.

identified_line.line: 7. Expected survival will be ≥ 12 weeks.
8. The organ and hematopoietic functions must meet the following requirements:
* Hemoglobin (HGB)≥90 g/L (gram per litre), no blood transfusion within two weeks;

criterions.exact_snippets: no blood transfusion within two weeks

and_criteria.exact_snippets: no blood transfusion within two weeks

identified_line.line: * White blood cell count (WBC) ≥ 2.5×10^9/L;
* Absolute neutrophil count (ANC) ≥ 1.5×10^9/L;
* Platelet count (PLT) ≥ 80×10^9/L;
* Total bilirubin (TBIL) ≤ 3.0ng/dL or ≤ 5 ULN (Upper Limit of Normal);

criterions.exact_snippets: Total bilirubin (TBIL) ≤ 3.0ng/dL or ≤ 5 ULN (Upper Limit of Normal)
Total bilirubin (TBIL) ≤ 3.0ng/dL or ≤ 5 ULN (Upper Limit of Normal)

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Total bilirubin (TBIL) ≤ 3.0ng/dL or ≤ 5 ULN (Upper Limit of Normal)
Total bilirubin (TBIL) ≤ 3.0ng/dL or ≤ 5 ULN (Upper Limit of Normal)

identified_line.line: * Aspartate aminotransferase (AST) and alanine aminotransferase (ALT) ≤ 2.5×ULN; AST and ALT≤ 5×ULN in case the abnormal hepatic function is caused by hepatocellular carcinoma or liver metastasis from other tumors;

criterions.exact_snippets: AST and ALT≤ 5×ULN ... abnormal hepatic function is caused by hepatocellular carcinoma or liver metastasis
criterions.criterion: AST and ALT levels in case of hepatocellular carcinoma or liver metastasis

and_criteria.exact_snippets: abnormal hepatic function is caused by hepatocellular carcinoma or liver metastasis
AST and ALT≤ 5×ULN ... abnormal hepatic function is caused by hepatocellular carcinoma or liver metastasis
and_criteria.criterion: AST and ALT levels in case of hepatocellular carcinoma or liver metastasis

identified_line.line: * Serum creatinine (Cr) ≤ 1.5×ULN; or creatinine clearance (CrCl) ≥ 50 mL/min (milliliter per minute);
9. Prothrombin time (PT): INR (International Normalized Ratio) <1.7 or prolonged, PT prolonged < 4 seconds from normal level;

criterions.exact_snippets: PT prolonged < 4 seconds from normal level

and_criteria.exact_snippets: PT prolonged < 4 seconds from normal level

identified_line.line: 10. Normal neurologic evaluation;
11. Sufficient venous access for venous intravenous blood collection and infusion, no other contraindications for blood cell separation;

criterions.exact_snippets: Sufficient venous access for venous intravenous blood collection and infusion
no other contraindications for blood cell separation

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Sufficient venous access for venous intravenous blood collection and infusion
no other contraindications for blood cell separation

identified_line.line: 12. Able to receive treatment and follow-up, including the treatment at the enrolled site;

criterions.criterion: ability to receive treatment at the enrolled site

and_criteria.criterion: ability to receive treatment at the enrolled site

identified_line.line: 13. Female subjects of childbearing age must take acceptable measures to minimize the possibility of pregnancy during the trial. The serum or urine pregnancy test must be negative prior to pre-treatment for female subjects of childbearing age;

criterions.exact_snippets: must take acceptable measures to minimize the possibility of pregnancy during the trial
The serum or urine pregnancy test must be negative prior to pre-treatment

and_criteria.exact_snippets: must take acceptable measures to minimize the possibility of pregnancy during the trial
The serum or urine pregnancy test must be negative prior to pre-treatment

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 70 Years
1. Pregnant or breastfeeding female subjects;
2. Active infection of hepatitis B, or active hepatitis C;
3. Infection with HIV/AIDS (Human Immunodeficiency Virus / Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome);

criterions.exact_snippets: Infection with HIV/AIDS (Human Immunodeficiency Virus / Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Infection with HIV/AIDS (Human Immunodeficiency Virus / Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome)

identified_line.line: 4. Other active infection with clinical significance;

criterions.exact_snippets: Other active infection with clinical significance

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Other active infection with clinical significance

identified_line.line: 5. Previous diseases or concurrent diseases:

Subjects diagnosed as serious autoimmune disease in long-term (over two months) requirement of systemic immunosuppressant (steroid), or as immune mediated symptomatic diseases including ulcerative colitis, Crohn's disease, rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), autoimmune vasculitis (e.g., Wegener's granulomatosis);

criterions.exact_snippets: long-term (over two months) requirement of systemic immunosuppressant (steroid)

diagnosed as ... immune mediated symptomatic diseases including ulcerative colitis, Crohn's disease, rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), autoimmune vasculitis (e.g., Wegener's granulomatosis)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: long-term (over two months) requirement of systemic immunosuppressant (steroid)

or_criteria.exact_snippets: diagnosed as ... immune mediated symptomatic diseases including ulcerative colitis, Crohn's disease, rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), autoimmune vasculitis (e.g., Wegener's granulomatosis)

identified_line.line: 6. Subjects with previous diagnosis as motor neuron disease;

criterions.exact_snippets: previous diagnosis as motor neuron disease

not_criteria.exact_snippets: previous diagnosis as motor neuron disease

identified_line.line: 7. Subjects with previous disease of toxic epidermal necrolysis;

criterions.exact_snippets: previous disease of toxic epidermal necrolysis

and_criteria.exact_snippets: previous disease of toxic epidermal necrolysis

identified_line.line: 8. Having any mental disorder that may affect the understanding of informed consent and relevant questionnaires, including dementia, altered mental status;

and_criteria.exact_snippets: that may affect the understanding of informed consent and relevant questionnaires
and_criteria.criterion: understanding of informed consent and relevant questionnaires

identified_line.line: 9. Having serious uncontrollable disease judged in the study that may affect the subjects receiving the study treatment;
14. Meningeal metastasis or central nervous system metastasis in the last 6 months, with obvious underlying diseases of the central nervous system, and leaving obvious symptoms;

criterions.exact_snippets: obvious underlying diseases of the central nervous system
criterions.criterion: underlying diseases of the central nervous system

and_criteria.exact_snippets: obvious underlying diseases of the central nervous system
and_criteria.criterion: underlying diseases of the central nervous system

and_criteria.exact_snippets: obvious underlying diseases of the central nervous system
and_criteria.criterion: underlying diseases of the central nervous system

identified_line.line: 15. Subjects with NYHA (New York Heart Association) heart failure grade ≥ 2 or uncontrollable hypertension by standard treatment and requiring special treatment, or with history of myocarditis, or occurrence of myocardial infarction within one year;

criterions.exact_snippets: NYHA (New York Heart Association) heart failure grade ≥ 2
uncontrollable hypertension by standard treatment and requiring special treatment
uncontrollable hypertension by standard treatment and requiring special treatment
occurrence of myocardial infarction within one year

and_criteria.exact_snippets: NYHA (New York Heart Association) heart failure grade ≥ 2
uncontrollable hypertension by standard treatment and requiring special treatment
uncontrollable hypertension by standard treatment and requiring special treatment

or_criteria.exact_snippets: occurrence of myocardial infarction within one year

identified_line.line: 16. Previous organ transplantation or be ready for organ transplantation;
17. Pancreatic cancer with pancreatitis;
18. Active bleeding;
19. Subjects with pleural effusion or abdominal effusion that require clinical treatment or intervention;
20. Being judged by investigators as inappropriate to participate in this study.

criterions.exact_snippets: Being judged by investigators as inappropriate to participate in this study

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Being judged by investigators as inappropriate to participate in this study

identified_line.line: 3. Subjects are diagnosed as recurrent or refractory solid tumors (soft tissue sarcoma, gastric cancer, pancreatic cancer and bladder cancer) with identified unresectable advanced or metastatic tumors by radiology and histology or cytology, progression after the first line or above treatment, or intolerance to standard treatment.

criterions.exact_snippets: diagnosed as recurrent or refractory solid tumors
soft tissue sarcoma, gastric cancer, pancreatic cancer and bladder cancer
identified unresectable advanced or metastatic tumors by radiology and histology or cytology
identified unresectable advanced or metastatic tumors by radiology and histology or cytology
progression after the first line or above treatment

requirement.expected_value: after the first line or above treatment

identified_line.line: 4. At least one measurable lesion in accordance with RECIST 1.1, the long diameter of non-lymph node lesions ≥10mm (millimeter) according to CT (computerized tomography) scan-sectional image, or the short diameter of lymph node lesions ≥15mm; the longest axis of the measurable lesion ≥10 mm in CT scan (CT scan layer ≤ 5mm); FDG PET (fluorodeoxyglucose -positron emission tomography) of the measurable lesion > 3 SUV (standardized uptake values).

criterions.exact_snippets: long diameter of non-lymph node lesions ≥10mm
criterions.criterion: long diameter of non-lymph node lesions

criterions.exact_snippets: short diameter of lymph node lesions ≥15mm
criterions.criterion: short diameter of lymph node lesions

criterions.exact_snippets: longest axis of the measurable lesion ≥10 mm
criterions.criterion: longest axis of the measurable lesion
FDG PET of the measurable lesion

identified_line.line: 10. Subjects with other active malignant tumors in the past five years including basal or squamous cell skin cancer, superficial bladder cancer or in situ breast cancer who have been completely cured, and without any follow-up treatment are not included;

criterions.exact_snippets: other active malignant tumors in the past five years
basal or squamous cell skin cancer
criterions.criterion: basal or squamous cell skin cancer

identified_line.line: 11. Current using of systemic steroid or steroid inhalant;

12. Have used of immunotherapy treatment in the past three months or PD-1 (Programmed cell death protein 1) antibody, PD-L1 (Programmed death-ligand 1) antibody, PD-L2 antibody, CD137 (tumor necrosis factor receptor superfamily member 9, 4-1BB) antibody or CTLA-4 (cytotoxic T-lymphocyte-associated protein 4) antibody, or cell therapy.

criterions.exact_snippets: Have used of immunotherapy treatment in the past three months
CD137 (tumor necrosis factor receptor superfamily member 9, 4-1BB) antibody

identified_line.line: 13. Allergy to immunotherapy or relevant medications;
